channel.title: Just A Glimpse - Andrew Adams [Cinematic EDM]
channel.description:
Hey guys!
It's been like 5 months, but I finally released a new track! It's an inspirational track with a cinematic EDM sort of feel, and I had a lot of fun making it. Feel free to leave feedback if you enjoyed it, and have a nice day. :smiley:
https://soundcloud.com/user-andrewadams/just-a-glimpse

item.title: Just A Glimpse - Andrew Adams [Cinematic EDM]

item.description:
Really good work man! Don’t hear a lot of stuff like this nowadays, so it’s good to see people branching out a bit!
